# Review of Hermitlux Table Top Dishwasher

## Introduction
- Brief overview of the Hermitlux Table Top Dishwasher
- Mention of key features such as 4 place settings, 5L built-in water tank, 6 programmes, touch control, baby care, and fruit wash
- Introduction to the purpose of the review

## Design and Build Quality
- Description of the design of the dishwasher
- Evaluation of the build quality and materials used
- Mention of any standout features in terms of design

## Performance
- Assessment of the dishwasher's performance in terms of cleaning dishes
- Discussion of the effectiveness of the 6 programmes
- Evaluation of the baby care and fruit wash features

## Ease of Use
- Description of the user interface and touch control
- Evaluation of how easy it is to operate the dishwasher
- Mention of any potential issues with usability

## Water Efficiency
- Analysis of the water consumption of the dishwasher
- Comparison with other similar products in terms of water efficiency
- Evaluation of the 5L built-in water tank

## Price and Value for Money
- Discussion of the price point of the Hermitlux Table Top Dishwasher
- Assessment of the value for money in relation to the features and performance
- Comparison with other dishwashers in a similar price range

## Conclusion
- Summary of the key points discussed in the review
- Recommendation based on the overall performance, design, and value for money of the Hermitlux Table Top Dishwasher.
